title: Drawing, "Goat Island", September 1858
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on dark tan paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in purple ink, at lower left:  Cooper Union [Lugt 457c]

Verso: Stamped in brown ink, at center(twice):  Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Goat Island  /  Sep.  / 58
description: Vertical view of showing a woodland scene of bushes and small trees, with tall trees in background; indications of some foliage and clouds seen between tree- tops, given in white gouache.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Goat Island", September 1858.
September 1858. Graphite, brush and white gouache on dark tan paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-182.
